Package controller

Class MaintenanceService

java.lang.Object
controller.MaintenanceService
public class MaintenanceService extends Object
The MaintenanceService class maintains the vending machine's condition.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MaintenanceService(MaintenanceData maintenanceData, VendingMachine vendingMachine, MaintenanceView maintenanceView)
    Constructs a MaintenanceService object with the specified vending machine and the maintenance's model and view.

    • MaintenanceService

      public MaintenanceService(MaintenanceData maintenanceData, VendingMachine vendingMachine, MaintenanceView maintenanceView)
      Constructs a MaintenanceService object with the specified vending machine and the maintenance's model and view.
      Parameters:
      maintenanceData - Model of the maintenanceService.
      vendingMachine - Vending machine to maintain.
      maintenanceView - View of the maintenanceService.

  • Method Details

    • stock

      public void stock(int amount, int slotNo, String itemName, int calories, int price)
      Stocks a new item to the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      amount - Amount of items to stock.
      slotNo - Slot Number of the vending machine.
      itemName - Name of the item.
      calories - Amount of calories the item has.
      price - How much the item is.

    • restock

      public void restock(int amount, int slotNo)
      Restocks an existing item of the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      amount - Amount of items to stock.
      slotNo - Slot Number of the vending machine.
